NK002(kha)002:0: 'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bzhugs so //
NK002(kha)002:2: +aa r+ya pra t+ai t+ya sa mut+pa da n+aa ma ma h+aa y+aa na s+au tra /
NK002(kha)002:4: 'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
NK002(kha)002:5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)002:6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
NK002(kha)002:7: bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas na ar mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb la /
NK002(kha)002:8: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams dang /
NK002(kha)002:10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
NK002(kha)002:11: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems
NK002(kha)002:12: dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che
NK002(kha)002:13: dpag tu med pas brgyan pa rnams dang /
NK002(kha)002:14: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang /
NK002(kha)002:16: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang /
NK002(kha)002:17: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
NK002(kha)002:18: dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa la sogs pa dang /
NK002(kha)002:20: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
NK002(kha)002:21: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla
NK002(kha)002:22: gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
NK002(kha)002:23: pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ri rab kyi rtse mo la btsugs te /
NK002(kha)002:24: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
NK002(kha)002:25: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK002(kha)002:26: bcom ldan 'das lha 'di dag ni mchod rten bgyid par 'tshal ba sha stag ste /
NK002(kha)002:28: ci nas tshangs pa'i bsod nams 'phel ba dang /
NK002(kha)002:31: tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /
NK002(kha)002:32: dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu las dge slong dang /
NK002(kha)002:35: dge bsnyen ma dag bsod nams shin tu mang du
NK002(kha)002:36: 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan
NK002(kha)002:37: 'das kyis de dag la chos bstan du gsol zhes
NK002(kha)002:38: zhus pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
NK002(kha)002:39: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa
NK002(kha)002:40: zhus pa dang / bka' stsal pa / ye d+har+m+aa
NK002(kha)002:41: he tu pra b+ha b+aa he tun te sh+aa n+ta
NK002(kha)002:42: th+aa ga to h+ya ba data /
NK002(kha)002:43: te sh+aany+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e bam b+aa d+ai
NK002(kha)002:44: ma h+aa sh+ra ma nah chos gang rgyus byung de
NK002(kha)002:45: dag gi // rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa //
NK002(kha)002:46: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te //
NK002(kha)002:47: dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs //
NK002(kha)002:48: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di lta ste /
NK002(kha)002:49: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku yin te /
NK002(kha)002:50: sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo //
NK002(kha)002:51: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs kyi bu'am /
NK002(kha)002:52: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la
NK002(kha)002:53: zhig gis mi gnas pa'i sa phyogs su mchod rten
NK002(kha)002:55: srog shing ni mo khab tsam /
NK002(kha)002:56: gdugs ni bak+ku la'i me tog tsam zhig byas la /
NK002(kha)002:57: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba chos kyi dbyings tshigs su bcad pa nang du bcug na /
NK002(kha)002:58: des tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskyed par 'gyur te /
NK002(kha)002:59: 'di nas shi 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
NK002(kha)002:60: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
NK002(kha)002:62: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
NK002(kha)002:63: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
NK002(kha)002:67: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
NK002(kha)002:68: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
